text: "He Was There (When I Needed You)" is a 1980 song by Tammy Wynette and is the leading single from her 21st studio album Only Lonely Sometimes. It went to number 17 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart and number 28 on the RPM Country Singles charts. ==Track listing== ;7" vinyl single * "He Was There (When I Needed You)" – 3:15 * "Only the Names Have Been Changed" – 3:11 == References == Category:1980 songs Category:Country songs Category:Tammy Wynette songs
title: He Was There (When I Needed You)
